ratings.en: SOS chikyuu!! Yomigaere Uchuu senkan Yamato!
Gouhou ippatsu!! Uchuu senkan Yamato shidou!!
Fuyuu tairiku dasshutsu!! Kiki o yobu hadouhou!!
Space Destroyer Yukikaze Sleeps in the Icefield!
Kyoui no sekai!! Hikari o tobikoeta Yamato
Yamato Braves Death! Destroy the Reflection Satellite Gun!
Yamato Sinks! Fateful Battle to Destroy the Enemy Stronghold!
Yamato hasshin!! 29-man 6-sen kounen e no chousen!!
Absolute Death! The Wishing Star of Orion, Hell-star!
Charge! Balanodon Special Attack Group!
Death Struggle! God, Weep for the Gamilas!
Decisive Battle! Fight for Honor at the Rainbow Star Group!
Desperate Challenge from Domel's Fleet!
Desperate Escape! The Galaxy's Different Dimension!
Earth! Yamato Returns!
Farewell, Solar System! From the Galaxy with Love!
Finally Arrived! Crest of the Magellanic Cloud's Wave!
Floating Fortress Island! Two Men Brave Death!
Homesickness of Space! My Mother's Tears Are My Tears!
Hurry, Yamato! Earth Is Suffering!
Iscandar! A Dying Planet of Love!
Planet Beemera, Underground Prison of Condemned Criminals!
Resolution! Break Through the Gamilas' Absolute Defense Line!
Revolving Defense! Asteroid Belt!
The Day Planet Balan's Sun Dropped!
The Galaxy's Ordeal! The Year 2200 Approaches!
